metadata.title: CVE-2021-43453 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A Heap-based Buffer Overflow vulnerability exists in JerryScript 2.4.0 andprior versions via an out-of-bounds read inparser_parse_for_statement_start in the js-parser-statm.c file. This issueis similar to CVE-2020-29657.

criterions.comment: iotjs package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
